mapper.insert: insert into nm_member( member_name, password, id_photo, birthday, email, intro, interest, nickname, sns ) values( #{name}, password(#{password}), #{photo}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{intro}, #{interest}, #{nickname}, #{sns})
mapper.select: select member_no, member_name, nickname, email from nm_member
select member_no, member_name, nickname, birthday, email, id_photo, intro, sns, create_date from nm_member where member_no=#{no}
select member_no, member_name, nickname from nm_member where member_name like #{keywordPattern} or nickname like #{keywordPattern}
select * from nm_member where email=#{email} and password=password(#{password})
mapper.update: update nm_member set alterkey = 'Y' where email = #{email} and alterkey = #{key}
update nm_member set alterkey = #{alterkey} where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into nm_member (email, password, member_name, nickname, id_photo, birthday, interest, intro, sns) values(#{email}, password(#{password}), #{name}, #{nickname}, #{photo}, #{birthday}, #{interest}, #{intro}, #{sns})
insert into nm_group_member( group_no, member_no, grade_no) values( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{gradeNo})
mapper.select: select m.*, g.group_name from nm_member m join nm_group_member gm on gm.member_no = m.member_no join nm_group g on g.group_no = gm.group_no where gm.member_no = #{memberNo} and register = 1
